SONG.author: Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five
SONG.name: The Message

VIDEO.name: Stranger Things
VIDEO.description: Mysterious events unfold in a small town as a group of kids encounters supernatural forces.

VIDEO.name: The Crown
VIDEO.description: A historical drama that chronicles the reign of Queen Elizabeth II and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

VIDEO.name: Money Heist
VIDEO.description: A group of criminals, led by 'The Professor', executes intricate heists on the Royal Mint of Spain and the Bank of Spain.

VIDEO.name: Unbox Therapy
VIDEO.description: Tech and gadget reviews, unboxings, and discussions about the latest consumer electronics.

VIDEO.name: PewDiePie
VIDEO.description: Gaming content, vlogs, and commentary from the most subscribed individual creator on YouTube.

VIDEO.name: TED-Ed
VIDEO.description: Educational animations and lessons covering a wide range of topics from science to literature.

VIDEO.name: FEL ČVUT
VIDEO.description: Záznamy přednášek, promovidea kateder a výzkumných skupin, akce, výzkumné výsledky aj.

VIDEO.name: The Mandalorian
VIDEO.description: A lone bounty hunter explores the outer reaches of the galaxy in the Star Wars universe.

VIDEO.name: The Simpsons
VIDEO.description: An animated sitcom that satirically explores the lives of the Simpson family and the residents of the fictional town of Springfield.

VIDEO.name: MythBusters
VIDEO.description: A team of special effects experts investigates and tests popular myths, urban legends, and movie scenes.

VIDEO.name: Planet Earth
VIDEO.description: A documentary series showcasing the beauty and diversity of the Earth's ecosystems and wildlife.

VIDEO.name: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
VIDEO.description: Seven black gnomes have found young white princess felt asleep.

VIDEO.name: Top Moments in NHL History
VIDEO.description: A compilation video showcasing the top moments in the history of the National Hockey League (NHL).

VIDEO.name: Muhammad Ali vs. Joe Frazier - 'The Thrilla in Manila'
VIDEO.description: The third and final bout between Muhammad Ali and Joe Frazier, held in Manila on October 1, 1975.

VIDEO.name: UFC 229 - Khabib Nurmagomedov vs. Conor McGregor
VIDEO.description: A highly anticipated lightweight title bout between Khabib Nurmagomedov and Conor McGregor, held on October 6, 2018, at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas.

VIDEO.name: FIFA World Cup Final 2014 - Germany vs. Argentina
VIDEO.description: The final match of the 2014 FIFA World Cup held at Maracanã Stadium in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

VIDEO.name: Inception
VIDEO.description: A mind-bending science fiction thriller directed by Christopher Nolan, exploring the concept of dreams within dreams.

VIDEO.name: Titanic
VIDEO.description: A romantic drama directed by James Cameron, depicting the ill-fated maiden voyage of the RMS Titanic.

VIDEO.name: Forrest Gump
VIDEO.description: A heartwarming drama directed by Robert Zemeckis, following the life of Forrest Gump, a man with a low IQ but a remarkable life story.

VIDEO.name: Зеленый слоник
VIDEO.description: Два младших офицера, сидя в одной камере на гауптвахте, вынуждены решать острые социальные и психологические вопросы в небольшом пространстве.

GAME.name: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
GAME.description: Embark on a time-traveling adventure as Link to save the land of Hyrule.

GAME.name: Civilization VI
GAME.description: Lead your civilization from ancient times to the modern era in this turn-based strategy game.

GAME.name: Super Mario Bros.
GAME.description: Join Mario in his classic quest to rescue Princess Peach from the clutches of Bowser.

GAME.name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
GAME.description: Play as Geralt of Rivia in this epic open-world RPG filled with monsters, quests, and moral choices.

GAME.name: StarCraft II
GAME.description: Command armies of futuristic factions in this real-time strategy game.

GAME.name: Grand Theft Auto V
GAME.description: Experience the sprawling open world of Los Santos and engage in various criminal activities.

GAME.name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
GAME.description: Immerse yourself in the vast fantasy world of Tamriel as the Dragonborn.

GAME.name: Diablo III
GAME.description: Battle hordes of demons and collect epic loot in this action RPG.

GAME.name: Fallout: New Vegas
GAME.description: Navigate the post-apocalyptic Mojave Wasteland in this RPG filled with choices and consequences.

GAME.name: Resident Evil 4
GAME.description: Survive a horror-filled adventure as Leon Kennedy in a quest to rescue the President's daughter.

GAME.name: FIFA 22
GAME.description: Experience realistic football gameplay and manage your favorite teams in this sports simulation.

GAME.name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted (2005)
GAME.description: Race and evade the police in this iconic racing game with an open-world structure.

GAME.name: Dark Souls
GAME.description: Face challenging enemies and explore a dark fantasy world in this action RPG.

GAME.name: The Last of Us
GAME.description: Navigate a post-apocalyptic world and experience a gripping narrative in this action-adventure game.

GAME.name: Leisure Suit Larry
GAME.description: Larry Laffer, a bumbling and lovable character, embarks on comical adventures in pursuit of love and romance.

GAME.name: Counter-Strike 1.6
GAME.description: A classic multiplayer first-person shooter where teams of terrorists and counter-terrorists face off in intense, tactical battles. Known for its simplicity, strategic gameplay, and iconic maps.

GAME.name: ТЕТРИС
GAME.description: Классическая головоломка, где игроки собирают и выстраивают блоки различных форм для создания цельных линий.
